Job Title: Senior Credit Analyst

Location: Pleasantville, NY

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Finance, Sales

Description:
OBJECTIVE:We have an opening for a Senior Credit Analyst based in our Pleasantville, NY office. This position will work in the office 3 days per week.
PRIMARY JOB RESPONSIBILITIES:The Senior Credit Analyst, reporting to the Credit Manager, will be responsible for:Investigating and resolving customer deductions. Providing necessary proof of delivery, invoice, and packing information to dispute short payments in a timely manner. Identify and propose corrective steps to avoid future chargebacks.Developing and maintaining cooperative working relationships with assigned customers, as well as internal departments.Reporting and tracking aged receivables promptly and consistently for assigned customer accounts. Proactively managing due invoices, processing credit notes, and evaluating customer credit limit.Account reconciliation and submission of offsets/write-offs as needed to resolve open items on account.Review all unapplied cash on account and submit for application.Adherence to all departmental internal controls while reviewing an account for order releaseAssisting with any other additional responsibilities for reporting and audits as needed
QUALIFICATIONS:Proficient in Microsoft Excel and other M.S. Office programsExperience with SAP S4 Hana a plusExperience with department store chargebacks requiredExperience in commercial credit and collections or accounts receivable requiredExperience in a consumer products company preferredMust be a self-starter and multi-tasker with extreme attention to detail and accuracy. The candidate should work well in fast-paced environments and contribute to building a best-in-class team culture.
Compensation Range: Base Salary up to $65,000.00 per year contingent upon experience. 
ABOUT US:For over 285 years, ZWILLING J.A. Henckels has offered premium products that enhance professional and home chefs' lives worldwide. Since its start as an esteemed cutlery brand, the company has grown to include a coveted collection of cookware, flatware, glassware, and kitchen gadgets. Tradition, quality, innovation, and craftsmanship are their ingredients for success.Today, ZWILLING J.A. Henckels is an international industry leader that sells products in 100 countries. Always looking forward, ZWILLING acquired global heritage brands —Staub (France), Demeyere (Belgium), Ballarini (Italy), and MIYABI (Japan)—to give its customers access to the most exceptional kitchen products.

Experience Level (if available): None
